column5: Large home located on a quiet cul de sac in an exclusive Plano, Texas neighborhood overlooking a small private lake with fountains, 1 mile walking/running path and 2 parks.   Conveniently located-- Only a brief walk to the nearby shopping center with Starbucks, several restaurants and specialty shops. Just a few miles to the North for Shops of Legacy or South for major shopping areas and dozens of eateries. Willowbend Mall and Stonebriar Centre --both within 5 miles
column8: Plano-beautiful and private bed and bath
